original_title: La rêverie ou le mariage de Sylvia
overview: Sylvia Juszczyk, a Jewish woman in her forties who has been divorced for five years, is a dentist whose long working days are not the only source of happiness. She is in love with a young man who is unemployed because his skills are not adapted to the job market.
title: La rêverie ou le mariage de Sylvia
